text:
Tomcat refused to shutdown gracefully, reporting an error of unknown 
host "localhost" (I'm running Tomcat locally on my machine, which I 
call "dumbledore".
I added a line into /etc/hosts to associate 127.0.0.1 with "localhost" (after 
the line that does the same thing for the real host name, i.e. "dumbledore") 
and this solved the problem.
creator: ealikadic@yahoo.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
We use InetAddress.getLocalHost() - nothing else we can do, it's the JVM impl.
You can explicitely set an ip address in 3.3 (latest nightly)
